Key Match Events: Jason Holder took 4 for 7 as England was bowled out for 103 in 19.4 overs
Brandon King and Shai Hope put on 52 in 9.1 overs
Nicholas Pooran and Brandon King closed out the victory with an unbroken 52-run partnership
West Indies won by nine wickets with 17 balls to spare
Post-Match Reflections: West Indies skipper Kieron Pollard praised Holder and Cottrell for their bowling and fielding
Kieron Pollard highlighted the importance of the young players finishing off the victory
Eoin Morgan admitted it was not the start to the series they would have wanted
Jason Holder said the loss to Ireland in the ODI series fired up the team
Miscellaneous Highlights: The 2nd T20I is on Sunday at Bridgetown
